item.title: The Ritual Trailer: Al Pacino Returns To Religious Horror As An Exorcist 27 Years After Playing The Devil
item.description: 27 years after playing the Devil in The Devil’s Advocate, Al Pacino has returned to religious horror in the chilling first trailer for The Ritual.

item.title: Harry Potter Fan Art Imagines John Lithgow's Dumbledore As HBO's TV Reboot Approaches
item.description: As HBO’s TV reboot approaches, a new piece of Harry Potter fan art imagines what John Lithgow will look like as Hogwarts Headmaster Albus Dumbledore.

item.title: Denzel Washington Is Considering Adapting Another Shakespearean Story Into A Movie Based On A New Update
item.description: Denzel Washington is considering adapting another Shakespearean story into a movie, based on an update involving the actor's new show.
